author: Jeffrey Rhodes
text:
MML has invited MCCMA and other MML departments to make suggestions for the 2011 MML Conference.  If you have any suggestions please provide the following information and I will pass it along.
•   Suggested workshop title 
•   A brief workshop description 
•   Ideas for speakers
Thursday, September 16th is the deadline for submitting suggestions so please the details above if you have suggestions.
title: MML Conference Topics
